overview: Prem Piyasi is a 1997 Bangladeshi romantic film directed by Reza Hasmat. Reza Hasmat has written the screenplay and dialogues of the film in the story of Sunny Alam. Salman Shah and Shabnoor have acted in the best part in the film. [1] Other supporting roles have been played by Anwara, Rajib, Misha Saudagar and others.
title: Prem Piyashi
